scripts.build: npm run build:msg && npm run clean && npm run copy:codicon && ng build
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy:codicon && ng serve
scripts.copy:codicon: npx shx mkdir -p ./src/assets && npx shx cp ../../../node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/base/browser/ui/codicons/codicon/codicon.ttf ./src/assets/codicon.ttf
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy:codicon && ng build --watch --configuration development
